EmailTemplate.name: Nurture Chat Soon - Day 92
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to get a stunning website at a great discount
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to reach out one last time to see if you're interested in getting a beautiful real estate website for a discounted cost. Our team is ready to take your brand to the next level.
We only have a few slots left for your market this month, so if you're interested in taking advantage of this opportunity, let's chat and see how we can help you.
Don't miss out on this chance to stand out in a crowded market. Book a meeting today using this link: [Meeting Link].
Kind regards, {!User.Name}
